DOC.brief_summary: A multi-arm trial evaluate efficacy safety use gaseous nitric oxide treat moderate severe tinea pedis .
DOC.brief_title: A Dose Response Trial Evaluate Clinical Mycological Effect Nitric Oxide Subjects With Tinea Pedis

( clotrimazole , ketoconazole , miconazole , oxiconazole ( Oxistat® , Glaxo Smith Kline ) , sulconazole , naftifine ( Naftin® , Merz ) , terconazole , econazole nitrate ( Spectazole® , OrthoMcNeil ) , butoconazole , Fluconazole , ciclopirox olamine ( Loprox® , Medicis ) , tolnaftate , haloprogin ) , ZeasorbAF , antibacterial corticosteroids precede 14 day screen visit ( Day 1 ) , immediately around area evaluation .
